alert.note: Alert for Ozaukee; Sheboygan (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Beach Hazards Statement issued August 13 at 3:08AM CDT until August 14 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: ...BEACH HAZARDS STATEMENT REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM CDT THIS MORNING THROUGH SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Life threatening waves of 3 to 5 feet and dangerous currents are expected. * WHERE...Beaches along Lake Michigan in Sheboygan, and Ozaukee counties. * WHEN...From 10 AM CDT this morning through Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...Dangerous swimming conditions are expected due to high waves and onshore winds. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... Several beaches that will be most susceptible to the dangerous swimming conditions include General King Park Beach in Sheboygan... Kohler-Andrae State Park Beaches... North and South Beach in Port Washington...
info.instruction: Stay out of the water and away from dangerous areas like piers and breakwalls. Strong structural and longshore currents are expected. Rip currents are possible.
